talk.author: did:plc:g2c2kd57bnfkmnpyuqyqruq7
talk.utter: In a lot of Indonesian cultures who eat dog, they also keep and love dogs as pets or as working animals. Just without any birth control some of the dogs go to market for food-- particularly in times of famine. If they are killed humanely I do not see the problem.

talk.author: did:plc:g2c2kd57bnfkmnpyuqyqruq7
talk.utter: It's really hard to look at if you are not used to it. I get that. I could not eat a companion animal. I can't even eat pigs for similar reasons. But like I said, increasing tourism will likely kill it.

talk.author: did:plc:qiknc4t5rq7yngvz7g4aezq7
talk.utter: I mean I’ve eaten dog before at a North Korean restaurant myself lol (didn’t order it though)

talk.author: did:plc:qiknc4t5rq7yngvz7g4aezq7
talk.utter:
One of those DPRK owned places in Phnom Penh. 

I’ve also seen dog meat/bits for sale before and it’s just one of those things (no French bulldogs or Goldens though)

talk.author: did:plc:g2c2kd57bnfkmnpyuqyqruq7
talk.utter: Harder to look at when you see them in a local market. I won't cry when it disappears, which I believe it eventually will.

talk.author: did:plc:g2c2kd57bnfkmnpyuqyqruq7
talk.utter: In a lot of Indonesian cultures who eat dog, they also keep and love dogs as pets or as working animals. Just without any birth control some of the dogs go to market for food-- particularly in times of famine. If they are killed humanely I do not see the problem.

talk.utter: I mean I’ve eaten dog before at a North Korean restaurant myself lol (didn’t order it though)

talk.author: did:plc:g2c2kd57bnfkmnpyuqyqruq7
talk.utter: I have eaten any number of mystery meat stews out in the hinterlands of Indonesia. I am choosing to believe goat. But who knows?

talk.author: did:plc:g2c2kd57bnfkmnpyuqyqruq7
talk.utter: I have eaten any number of mystery meat stews out in the hinterlands of Indonesia. I am choosing to believe goat. But who knows?

talk.author: did:plc:qiknc4t5rq7yngvz7g4aezq7
talk.utter: I regret to inform you that dog and goat taste VERY similar
